The Hitchcock Team Mission: To help great people realize the joy of selling or buying a home they love while providing the most phenomenal service experience ever. Do you love where you live?

________________________________
From: Faez Amro <ahusa85@yahoo.com>
Sent: Monday, July 2, 2018 9:32:21 AM
To: Nicole Quichocho
Subject: Home details



Thanks for your response and for accepting to help. What we need in a

home are single family house,  4 or 5 bedrooms ,with a formal living room and dining room, car parking space for

three cars, garden, pool or a space to construct one and in a very

safe and secured area in your city,  our budget is  bellow 2m

dollars.

Please try and put some picture together and send to us for me and my

family to go through it. Our life is at risk here in Syria the

government is after us and they want to kill me and my family after

my defection from the regime, resignation from my position and

withdrawal from the Baath Party of the Syrian Government,i went ahead

to say that the government has become a gang for killing and

destruction,committing massacres against our innocent people who came

out to demand freedom that is the reason why the are after us and  we

want to relocate.

I plead with you to keep this our home purchase transaction

confidential let it be between me and you for now, we want a very

quiet and secret home purchase and relocation.

You can reach me on the phone number but most time is hard to connect

due to poor and constantly bad network.  I will be waiting for you reply.

Thanks for understanding
Yours sincerely

Faez Amro.

+963 33 213960
--------------------------------------------

tickets.subject: Eric Parker - Outlook Signature Help
tickets.description:
Hi,

 

I purchased a new Lenovo laptop and have it setup with a dock in my home office. I have the APR Microsoft office suite on it and it is working BUT:

 

I can’t add my signature

Contacts: have been an issue for over a year after one of the updates, I have two or three different contact folders I need consolidated

Documents: I use Google Drive for saving on backup, I need that as a default save location

Windows set up a separate Outlook account and now when I click an email address in MLS it takes me to that account

 

Please set up a time we can connect and work on this, I am home now but leaving at 11:15, later this afternoon after 3:00 is open

 

Thank you,

 

Eric Parker APR almaden office

tickets.subject: Allison Wyek: My Log In
tickets.description:
Hi Help Desk,

 

Could you please move Allison’s profile to Corte Madera office? She no longer works in the Ross office. Also, I will have her contact you on Saturday as I think she needs update on CM computer. Name: CM1-016cn. She may need the 2Factory set up?

 

 

Thank you,

 

Maria Michener l Office Administrator

Alain Pinel Realtors® l  Marin l Sonoma

mmichener@apr.com  l  415.755.1111

 

 

 

 

 

From: Allison Wyek
Sent: Sunday, July 01, 2018 10:20 AM
To: Maria Michener
Subject: My Log In

 

Hi Maria,

 

I've always had issues with my computer log in, I don't know if you remember that from when I worked primarily in Ross. I have noticed this weekend the problem has escalated. Yesterday I had to input my password 4 times to actually get on (then it was fine) and today I again had to repeatedly input my password but then it "couldn't find my desktop" so I could get through but I have no resources for agents at the moment.

 

Have you heard of this happening to anyone else lately? Just me? I'm wondering if it's a network problem or just my account. I am kind of used to it now, dealing with it for over a year, but I definitely don't want it to get worse like it has this weekend.

 

Thanks,

 

Allison Wyek

Reception

Alain Pinel Realtors® Corte Madera

O 415.755.1111

apr.com

tickets.subject: Listing not showing up on APR site
tickets.raw_subject: Listing not showing up on APR site
tickets.description:
Hello,

 

This listing was put on MLS on Saturday, but it’s not displaying yet on the APR site – is there any way to get it posted so he can send out an eflyer today?

 

ML81712629 - Cheyenne

 

Thanks so much for your assistance,

 

Heidi Lewis
MARKETING COORDINATOR

Alain Pinel Realtors®
Los Gatos
Monday through Thursday 8:30 to 5:30 pm

408.357.8695

 

 

From: Mike Hammill
Sent: Monday, July 02, 2018 2:54 PM
To: Heidi Lewis
Subject: RE: Facebook Ad and Email help

 

Hmm, I did put it on the market on Saturday, so it just maybe needs more time to load. I will wait till tomorrow

 

Mike Hammill

Alain Pinel Realtors

DRE #01859722

mhammill@apr.com

408-655-3752 Cell

 

I have not and will not verify or investigate any information contained in

documents sent by third parties.

 

From: Heidi Lewis
Sent: Monday, July 02, 2018 2:53 PM
To: Mike Hammill
Subject: RE: Facebook Ad and Email help

 

When did you put it on the MLS? I’m not seeing it on your APR page – it needs to be there to do the e-flyer first. It may take 30 mins or so for the server to synch from the MLS.

 

http://mhammill.apr.com/

 

Or you can upload it as an exclusive property – with photos and description and send out an eflyer that way.

 

 

Heidi Lewis
MARKETING COORDINATOR

Alain Pinel Realtors®
Los Gatos
Monday through Thursday 8:30 to 5:30 pm

408.357.8695

 

 

From: Mike Hammill
Sent: Monday, July 02, 2018 2:45 PM
To: Heidi Lewis
Subject: RE: Facebook Ad and Email help

 

Hi Heidi,

 

I am having trouble sending out a just listed email blast for our listing on Cheyenne.

 

Here is the MLS number ML81712629

 

I just want it to say

 

“Just Listed in Blossom Valley”

 

And header:

 

“Stunning 4 bedroom remodel”

 

Can you help with this?? I have no idea why it’s auto-populating for me

 

THANKS!

 

-Mike

 

Mike Hammill

Alain Pinel Realtors

DRE #01859722

mhammill@apr.com

408-655-3752 Cell

 

I have not and will not verify or investigate any information contained in

tickets.subject: Problem with Zillow
tickets.description:
Hello folks,

It is my understanding information is supposed to auto-populate to Zillow when we list a property.  I listed one on Saturday 6/30 and the Zillow history shows it was added the same day, but also shows it was removed today.  I need your help to figure out why please.
[image1.png]
It is still showing as active on MLS with no changes since I added it on 6/30.

Sincerely,

Benedict Pedro
CPRES Certified Probate Real Estate Specialist
Real Estate Collaborative Specialist - Divorce (RCS-D)
Alain Pinel Realtors Presidents Club Member
408.242.4823<tel:408.242.4823> mobile

tickets.subject: Livermore printer issues
tickets.description:
Hello all,

 

Our printer is not working in the Livermore office.  Please see the comment from one of our agents below after an hour of our troubleshooting.  This is after two other agents attempted printing.

 

Not sure if this is an IT problem or printer problem.  Please advise…  Thank you

 

 

This is a text from Daniel Alpher:

 

Yes-it's being temperamental when I unplug it and wait a minute & plug it back in it'll print a few pages... I was printing out an offer that I downloaded to my desktop and then printed it , but I was thinking maybe because the document was secured from DOCUSIGN as a PDF maybe that's why it only printed the first four pages-The agent emailed it to me from DOCUSIGN... i'll just take care of this tomorrow but thought I'd give you the update and let you know that the printer is not working properly-thank you

 

Please advise,

Don

 

Don Faught,CRS, G.R.I.

Vice President/Managing Broker

ALAIN PINEL REALTORS®

Office 925.251.1111

CalBRE# 00971395

2013 California Association of REALTORS® President

2013 California REALTOR® of the Year

2012 Bay East Association of REALTOR® of the Year

NAR Hall of Fame

 

Surround yourself with people that inspire you.

 

The experience is Alain Pinel REALTORS® visitapr.com (http://www.apr.com/)

This e-mail message, together with any attachments, is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to which it is addressed. It may contain information that is confidential and prohibited from disclosure. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination or copying of this message or any attachment is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in error, please notify the original sender at (925) 251-1111 and destroy this e-mail, along with any attachments. Thank you.

tickets.subject: Re: Happy 4th of July
tickets.description:
Hi APR help desk, 

This was not in Kerry’s scheduled emails as we had already created one to go out tomorrow. Also why did it go out a day early? This is the second time this has happened. We did not want this email to go out as we spent time creating the one that is going out tomorrow on the actual holiday. 

Please advise.

Thank you,
Kerry Zuvella

tickets.description:

Warm Regards,

Rebecca

Rebecca Jepsen

REALTOR®  PRESIDENT'S CLUB  BRE# 01908462

ALAIN PINEL REALTORS

Cell:  408-357-3990

R (http://www.apr.com/rjepsen) ebeccaJepsen.com

 

 

From: HUMAM ALJAZAERI <dnr@leadrelay.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 3, 2018 at 3:51 AM
To: Rebecca Jepsen <rjepsen@apr.com>
Subject: [HUMAM ALJAZAERI]: Re: Thank you for contacting us

 

Hello,

Please can you help me on this?

We are a family of 3 and I will love to purchase a home for my family in
your country because we are planning to relocate to your country as soon as
possible.

We just need a family home that will take care of me, my wife and my son,
the house at minimum should have 4 rooms and 1 sitting room with toilets
and bathrooms, it should have good garage for parking of cars and also have
a good environment.

Our price range is US$1M to US$3M dollars home; it should be located in a
very safety area considering the safety of my family, however, we can also
consider other luxury homes that are very good.

I equally want to invest in real estate business in your country, please
can tell me little about real investments + other investments that are
profitable in your country.

Please forward to us the home pictures that you have in your listings so
that we can go through them before making a choice?

Thank you and I look forward to getting your response.
Dr. Humam al-Jazaeri
Minister of Economy and Foreign Trade of Syria
